mapper.select: select * from MST_user order by id
mapper.insert: insert into MST_user(user_name, user_password, user_address, user_type, author, creation_date, updater, updated_date) values(#{name}, #{password},#{address},#{type},#{author}, #{creation_date}, #{updater}, #{updated_date})
mapper.update: update MST_user set user_name=#{name}, user_address=#{address} where id= #{id}
